backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing user profile management and listing creation with access control and input validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference document listing short summaries of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the React app with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup defining all app routes and rendering layout, theme provider, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Route guard that shows a loading spinner or sign-in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInPromp: Card prompting unauthenticated users to sign in with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorAl: Reusable alert component displaying error messages using shadcn UI styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing header, footer, and profile setup modal around all pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with branding, attribution, and platform tagline.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation links, mobile menu, and user greeting based on authentication and profile state.
frontend/src/components/listings/BrowseC: Search, category filter, and sort controls for browsing listings.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Displays listing details with price, location, and optional edit/deactivate actions.
Form for creating or editing listings with validation, error display, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/features/listings/listingsF: Filters and sorts listings by search text, category, and sort option.
frontend/src/features/listings/listingsQ: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deactivating listings using the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/listings/listingVa: Validates listing input fields with length and value constraints, returning errors.
frontend/src/features/profile/profileQue: React Query hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus base styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutHelpPage.tsx: Shows an About section and FAQ accordion explaining Kisan Kart and providing user help.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseListingsPage.ts: Displays all active listings with search, category filters, sorting, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/CreateListingPage.tsx: Authenticated page providing a form to create a new listing and redirecting on success.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and calls to action for browsing or creating listings.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single listing, handling loading/error states and showing description, metadata, and navigation back to browsing.
frontend/src/pages/MyListingsPage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's listings with options to edit or deactivate them, including an edit dialog and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current metadata, features, requirements, and image needs for the Kisan Kart application.
